about.summary: An R wrapper around the API of TheyWorkForYou, a parliamentary monitoring site that scrapes and repackages Hansard (the UK's parliamentary record) and augments it with information from the Register of Members' Interests, election results, and voting records to provide a unified source of information about UK legislators and their activities. See <http://www.theyworkforyou.com> for details.

An R wrapper around the API of TheyWorkForYou, a parliamentary monitoring site that scrapes and repackages Hansard (the UK's parliamentary record) and augments it with information from the Register of Members' Interests, election results, and voting records to provide a unified source of information about UK legislators and their activities. See <http://www.theyworkforyou.com> for details.

name: r-twfy
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.1.0' %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-twfy
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/twfy_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/twfy/twfy_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 87f185e6216fb35f3f80e86f4d4ccdec4c4ebc97661ad064b1f6a9887ca2bd93

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 2
  noarch: generic

  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

# Suggests: knitr, rmarkdown
requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]

  host:
    - r-base
    - r-httr
    - r-jsonlite

  run:
    - r-base
    - r-httr
    - r-jsonlite

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('twfy')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('twfy')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://conjugateprior.github.io/twfy

  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: An R wrapper around the API of TheyWorkForYou, a parliamentary monitoring site that
    scrapes and repackages Hansard (the UK's parliamentary record) and augments it with
    information from the Register of Members' Interests, election results, and voting
    records to provide a unified source of information about UK legislators and their
    activities. See <http://www.theyworkforyou.com> for details.

  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
